title: Where do I find this mockup template?
content:
Where do I find this mockup template?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416003113im_/http:/typophile.com/files/08a0fd7ef11c0417b695523478a2345a_4143.png)
author: saeglopur

comments.content:
They look like real objects to me, not mockups. Note the subtle imperfections, wrinkles, etc.

A quick Google shows it's the original work of a design student. He probably took real objects (envelopes, etc), transferred his design to them, and then photographed them. Or he photographed blank objects and then added logos in Photoshop.

[http://weandthecolor.com/jorgen-grotdal-identity-rebrand/32028](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416003113/http:/weandthecolor.com/jorgen-grotdal-identity-rebrand/32028 "http://weandthecolor.com/jorgen-grotdal-identity-rebrand/32028")
